questions.text: 1. Can you explain the concept of Object Relational Mapping (ORM) and how it is used in Python web development?
2. How would you design a RESTful API using Python and Flask/Django? Can you discuss the key components and best practices involved?

3. What is the significance of asynchronous programming in Python back-end development? Can you provide examples of when and how asynchronous programming can be beneficial in improving performance and scalability of web applications?
